availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Frederick Hillman (Hamilton County, Ohio, shoeMaker)

body.p: Hamilton County, Ohio, shoe maker. Native of Hanover, Germany. Married to Effa Hillman in Cincinnati, Ohio, on July 14, 1856. Father of Emma Hillman and Loui Hillman. Shoemaker in Hamilton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Harrison, p. 466.
https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/141949946/george-frederick-hillman
